source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.
source_objects.title: Creativity

items.title: GO PRO -  How to Plan and Control Your Creative Projects
objectives_summary: Break down creative projects to the 7 standard chunks.
Use micro-deadlines and dynamic resolution planning for a hyper-focus workflow.
Use Fractal Chunking to plan and manage projects of any kind and size, from personal projects to massive studio productions.

items.title: Singing: How to Succeed at Vocal Auditions
items.headline: A training course for performers to succeed at vocal auditions for Film, Theater, and Television.
objectives_summary: Feel more confident performing in high stake situations like at auditions and in front of an audience.
Know what to expect at a your audition with my Audition 101 Guideline Template.
Discover your Secret Weapon Talent to stand out and wow the Judges.

items.title: The Mala Making Course  | Create Your Own Mala Profesionaly
items.headline: Mindfulnese, Meditative  with Mala
objectives_summary: Understanding Meaning Of Mala
Why 108  Beads?
Learn the Mala Materials

items.title: Collage for beginners   -An abstract flower
items.headline: A creative project anyone can make their own by choosing their own papers.
objectives_summary: Choose their own papers to create their own interpretation of my project
Learn how to choose painting surfaces for their project
Learn to take care of their brushes

items.title: Hollywood Secrets-Acting in TV, Film, Commercials & Theatre

visible_instructors.job_title: Actor in tv and film. Acting teacher in scene study
visible_instructors.title: Clive Dancey
visible_instructors.name: Clive

items.headline: **** SPECIAL OFFER  FOR JULY AND AUGUST ONLY **** 3 FREE COURSES -  Headshots , showreels - audition like a pro
objectives_summary: How to get in front of the top casting directors
How to get a top agent
How to audition like the top actors and actresses

items.title: Intuitive Healing Art Course
items.headline: An abstract approach to help discover your inner-self, remove need for perfection & heal through creative intention.
objectives_summary: To paint emotions and feelings onto canvas allowing the student to heal emotionally in an alternative intuitive way.
To release the need for perfection, approaching art in an abstract unplanned way.
To set intent to heal through art

items.title: How to Write Space Adventure (SF Sisters)

visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.
visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf

items.headline: The core characteristics of the genre, and how to create your story and characters
objectives_summary: Conceive, write and perfect a Space Adventure novel

items.title: Full guide to becoming a Google Slides Master
items.headline: Learn all of the essential in's and out's or creating eye-catching and engaging presentations using Google Slides.
objectives_summary: Students will learn all of the key functionality in using Google Slides as well as how to create their own eye-catching and engaging presentation.

items.title: Creative Problem Solving
items.headline: Creative Techniques to creatively generate practical solutions to practical problems
objectives_summary: Apply a range of creative thinking techniques to generate potential solutions to many types of problem at work and beyond.
Identify the areas of work or life where a creative problem solving approach will be appropriate
Describe the principles of Left Brain / Right Brain and Lateral thinking.

items.title: Hyper Learning Strategies & Speed Reading for All! - A Deeks
items.headline: A Complete Speed Reading & Hyper Learning Study Skills Course. Improve your Memory and Learning Strategies.
objectives_summary: You will learn that your memory is better than you think it is.
Learning strategies that will take you to the next level.
You will read faster. Some past students started at 150 words per minute (wpm) & now read at over 1000 wpm.

items.title: Two Point Perspective
items.headline: Learning Perspective with Nur
objectives_summary: Two point perspective
Basic drawing
Quick sketching

items.title: Rubik's Cube hypnotized

visible_instructors.job_title: Office productivity, Data analyst and stock trader
visible_instructors.title: Chandramouli Jayendran
visible_instructors.name: Chandramouli

items.headline: Guaranteed solving of a standard Rubik's cube by watching this course
objectives_summary: Will solve the rubiks cube on their own
Their Logical Thinking will also improve
Especially it a very good excercise for the fingers and brain

items.title: Story Development: Dialogue, subtext and dramaturgy

visible_instructors.job_title: Creative Writing eCourses by Scribble Ink Story Consultancy
visible_instructors.title: Scribble Online
visible_instructors.name: Scribble

items.headline: NEW CONTENT ON ITS WAY!
objectives_summary: You'll have in-depth knowledge of dialogue, subtext and dramaturgy.
Improved writing and editing skills.
Improved confidence and creativity.

items.title: Amazon Vella: Self-publishing eBooks One Chapter at a Time
items.headline: Learn writing with templates and self-publishing serial cellphone ready eBooks one chapter at a time with Amazon Vella.
objectives_summary: What is Amazon Vella?  Why you should self-publish on Amazon Vella today.  How to get additional information on Amazon Vella and remain informed.
How to create story images for Amazon Vella publication using Microsoft Powerpoint 2016.  Image requirements and best practices.  Download my template.
How to outline a Vella story using my Vella Story Template - Bible download.  How to write a Vella story and episodes using my Vella Story Template download.

items.title: How to write a book: Part I - From idea to first draft
items.headline: Learn How to Write Your First Book
objectives_summary: The student will learn how to write a book: from idea to draft.
The student will learn five reasons why they should write a book.
The student will learn the seven tools needed to write a book.

items.title: Creative writing for kids: Write the future!
items.headline: Bring creative writing to your home-school lessons. Write a thrilling futuristic story...
objectives_summary: KNOW the techniques good writers use
UNDERSTAND how to plot a futuristic story and develop characters
And BE ABLE TO enjoy writing a great sci-fi or futuristic story!
